jRead - an in-place JSON element reader
=======================================

All the code is in jRead.c

Read comments in the source.

Compiled on VisualStudio 2010 as plain old C

Executable for Windows is in \Release

for info run:     jRead ? 

for examples run: jRead t


There's an article on CodeProject:
  http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/885389/jRead-an-in-place-JSON-element-reader



TonyWilk
10mar2015
24sep2016
